settings.healthBarHideInRift: Hide health bar while in the Rift
settings.healthTextHideInRift: Hide health text while in the Rift
settings.healthShowInRift: Show vanilla hearts in the Rift
settings.defenceTextHideInRift: Hide defence text while in the Rift
